page.title: 07TRADE
page.content: There are no shops in our block, although Bonchester Bridge does have a Post Office and General Store,and a Public House.People get the bulk of their shopping in either Hawick or Jedburgh,or one of the more distant cities. {MOBILE SHOPS}provide a valuable service to the district,and a grocer,butcher,and fishmonger/baker deliver door-to-door once or twice a week.Milk comes three times a week, and coal and logs are aso available from various contractors.Specialist clothing and equipment suppliers visit farms regularly.A{BLACKSMITHS}in the block supplies many types of hardwear and does many agricultural repairs. A {GARAGE}supplies petrol and a small market garden grows plants for sale in the open markets in nearby towns.
